mapper.select:
--UAgd01Krv.Cagd058UKR[fnagd058Exec] Query1 SELECT ISNULL(A.DIV_CODE,'') AS DIV_CODE , ISNULL(A.PJT_CODE,'') AS PJT_CODE , ISNULL(A.EX_DATE,'') AS EX_DATE , ISNULL(A.EX_NUM,0) AS EX_NUM , ISNULL(B.AP_STS,'1') AS AP_STS , ISNULL(C.ACCNT,'') AS ACCNT_PD , ISNULL(D.ACCNT,'') AS ACCNT_PRPD , ISNULL(A.COST_PD,0.0) AS COST_PD , ISNULL(A.COST_PRPD,0.0) AS COST_PRPD , A.COMP_CODE FROM AGC340T AS A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN AGJ110T AS B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.EX_DATE = A.EX_DATE AND B.EX_NUM = A.EX_NUM AND (B.MOD_DIVI = '' OR B.MOD_DIVI IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ABA400T AS C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.PROFIT_DIVI = 'C7' LEFT JOIN ABA400T AS D WITH (NOLOCK) ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.PROFIT_DIVI = 'C6'
WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND AC_YYYYMM = #{ST_DATE} AND FR_AC_DATE = #{FR_DATE} AND TO_AC_DATE = #{TO_DATE} AND DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} AND PJT_CODE = #{AC_PROJECT_CODE}

/*agj260ukrServiceImpl.selectOption*/ SELECT MAX(ID_AUTOMAPPING) AS ID_AUTOMAPPING , MAX(DIV_CHANGE_YN) AS DIV_CHANGE_YN , MAX(REMARK_COPY) AS REMARK_COPY , MAX(AMT_ENTER) AS AMT_ENTER FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = '40' THEN UPPER(ISNULL(REF_CODE1, 'N')) ELSE '' END AS ID_AUTOMAPPING --결의전표 관리항목 사번에 로그인정보 자동매핑함 , CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = '42' THEN UPPER(ISNULL(REF_CODE1, 'Y')) ELSE '' END AS DIV_CHANGE_YN --전표_귀속부서 입력시 사업장 자동 변경 , CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = '44' THEN UPPER(ISNULL(REF_CODE1, 'Y')) ELSE '' END AS REMARK_COPY --전표_적요 copy방식_적요 빈 값 상태에서 Enter칠 때 copy , CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = '45' THEN UPPER(ISNULL(REF_CODE1, 'Y')) ELSE '' END AS AMT_ENTER --전표_금액이 0이면 마지막 행에서 Enter안넘어감(부가세 제외) FROM BSA100T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND MAIN_CODE = 'A165' AND SUB_CODE IN ('40', '42', '44', '45') ) T

--UAgj01Krv.Cagj260UKR[fnagj110nq] Query1 SELECT A.KEY_VALUE , A.AUTO_NUM , OPR_FLAG , A.EX_DATE OLD_AC_DATE , A.EX_NUM OLD_SLIP_NUM , A.EX_SEQ OLD_SLIP_SEQ , A.EX_DATE AC_DATE , SUBSTRING(A.EX_DATE,7,2) AC_DAY , A.EX_NUM SLIP_NUM , A.EX_SEQ SLIP_SEQ , A.SLIP_DIVI , A.ACCNT , ISNULL(B.ACCNT_NAME,'') ACCNT_NAME , ISNULL(A.CUSTOM_CODE,'') CUSTOM_CODE , ISNULL(A.CUSTOM_NAME,'') CUSTOM_NAME , ISNULL(A.AMT_I, 0.0) AMT_I , CASE A.DR_CR WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(A.AMT_I, 0.0) ELSE 0.0 END DR_AMT_I , CASE A.DR_CR WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(A.AMT_I, 0.0) ELSE 0.0 END CR_AMT_I , ISNULL(A.REMARK,'') REMARK , ISNULL(C.CODE_NAME,'') PROOF_KIND_NM , ISNULL(A.DEPT_NAME,'') DEPT_NAME , ISNULL(A.DIV_CODE,'') DIV_CODE , ISNULL(A.BILL_DIV_CODE,'') BILL_DIV_CODE , ISNULL(A.DEPT_CODE,'') DEPT_CODE , ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') DR_CR , ISNULL(A.P_ACCNT,'') P_ACCNT , ISNULL(A.PROOF_KIND,'') PROOF_KIND , ISNULL(A.MONEY_UNIT,'') MONEY_UNIT , ISNULL(A.EXCHG_RATE_O,0.0) EXCHG_RATE_O , ISNULL(A.FOR_AMT_I,0.0) FOR_AMT_I , ISNULL(A.IN_DIV_CODE,'') IN_DIV_CODE , ISNULL(A.IN_DEPT_CODE,'') IN_DEPT_CODE , ISNULL(A.IN_DEPT_NAME,'') IN_DEPT_NAME , ISNULL(A.AC_CODE1,'') AC_CODE1, ISNULL(A.AC_CODE2,'') AC_CODE2 , ISNULL(A.AC_CODE3,'') AC_CODE3, ISNULL(A.AC_CODE4,'') AC_CODE4 , ISNULL(A.AC_CODE5,'') AC_CODE5, ISNULL(A.AC_CODE6,'') AC_CODE6 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA1,'') AC_DATA1, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA2,'') AC_DATA2 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA3,'') AC_DATA3, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA4,'') AC_DATA4 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA5,'') AC_DATA5, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA6,'') AC_DATA6 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME1,'') AC_DATA_NAME1, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME2,'') AC_DATA_NAME2 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME3,'') AC_DATA_NAME3, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME4,'') AC_DATA_NAME4 , ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME5,'') AC_DATA_NAME5, ISNULL(A.AC_DATA_NAME6,'') AC_DATA_NAME6 , ISNULL(A.BOOK_CODE1,'') BOOK_CODE1, ISNULL(A.BOOK_CODE2,'') BOOK_CODE2 , ISNULL(A.BOOK_DATA1,'') BOOK_DATA1, ISNULL(A.BOOK_DATA2,'') BOOK_DATA2 , ISNULL(A.BOOK_DATA_NAME1,'') BOOK_DATA_NAME1, ISNULL(A.BOOK_DATA_NAME2,'') BOOK_DATA_NAME2 , ISNULL(A.ACCNT_SPEC,'') ACCNT_SPEC, ISNULL(A.SPEC_DIVI,'') SPEC_DIVI , ISNULL(A.PROFIT_DIVI,'') PROFIT_DIVI, ISNULL(A.JAN_DIVI,'') JAN_DIVI , ISNULL(A.PEND_YN,'N') PEND_YN, ISNULL(A.PEND_CODE,'') PEND_CODE , ISNULL(A.PEND_DATA_CODE,'') PEND_DATA_CODE, ISNULL(A.BUDG_YN,'N') BUDG_YN , ISNULL(A.BUDGCTL_YN,'N') BUDGCTL_YN, ISNULL(A.FOR_YN,'N') FOR_YN , ISNULL(A.POSTIT_YN,'') POSTIT_YN, ISNULL(A.POSTIT,'') POSTIT , ISNULL(A.POSTIT_USER_ID,'') POSTIT_USER_ID, ISNULL(A.INPUT_PATH,'') INPUT_PATH , ISNULL(A.INPUT_DIVI,'') INPUT_DIVI, ISNULL(A.AUTO_SLIP_NUM,'') AUTO_SLIP_NUM , ISNULL(A.CLOSE_FG,'') CLOSE_FG, ISNULL(A.INPUT_DATE,'') INPUT_DATE , ISNULL(A.INPUT_USER_ID,'') INPUT_USER_ID, ISNULL(A.CHARGE_CODE,'') CHARGE_CODE , ISNULL(A.CREDIT_CODE,'') CREDIT_CODE, ISNULL(A.REASON_CODE,'') REASON_CODE , uniLITE.fnCipherDecrypt(A.CREDIT_NUM, '') CREDIT_NUM_EXPOS,ISNULL(A.CREDIT_NUM, '') CREDIT_NUM , ISNULL(A.AP_STS,'') AP_STS , ISNULL(A.AP_DATE,'') AP_DATE, ISNULL(A.AP_USER_ID,'') AP_USER_ID , ISNULL(A.AC_DATE,'') EX_DATE, ISNULL(A.SLIP_NUM,0) EX_NUM , ISNULL(A.SLIP_SEQ,0) EX_SEQ , ISNULL(D1.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME1 , ISNULL(D2.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME2 , ISNULL(D3.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME3 , ISNULL(D4.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME4 , ISNULL(D5.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME5 , ISNULL(D6.AC_NAME ,'' ) AC_NAME6 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL1 ,'N') AC_CTL1 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL2 ,'N') AC_CTL2 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL3 ,'N') AC_CTL3 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL4 ,'N') AC_CTL4 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL5 ,'N') AC_CTL5 , ISNULL(A.AC_CTL6 ,'N') AC_CTL6 , ISNULL(D1.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE1 , ISNULL(D2.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE2 , ISNULL(D3.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE3 , ISNULL(D4.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE4 , ISNULL(D5.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE5 , ISNULL(D6.DT_TYPE ,0 ) AC_TYPE6 , ISNULL(D1.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN1 , ISNULL(D2.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN2 , ISNULL(D3.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN3 , ISNULL(D4.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN4 , ISNULL(D5.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN5 , ISNULL(D6.DT_LEN ,0 ) AC_LEN6 , ISNULL(D1.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP1, ISNULL(D2.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP2 , ISNULL(D3.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP3, ISNULL(D4.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP4 , ISNULL(D5.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP5, ISNULL(D6.DT_POPUP,'N') AC_POPUP6 , A.COMP_CODE , A.DRAFT_YN , ISNULL(D1.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT1, ISNULL(D2.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT2 , ISNULL(D3.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT3, ISNULL(D4.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT4 , ISNULL(D5.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT5, ISNULL(D6.DT_FMT,'0') AC_FORMAT6 FROM L_AGJ110T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ABA400T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.ACCNT = A.ACCNT LEFT JOIN BSA100T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.MAIN_CODE = 'A022' AND C.SUB_CODE = A.PROOF_KIND LEFT JOIN ABA200T D1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D1.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D1.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE1 LEFT JOIN ABA200T D2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D2.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE2 LEFT JOIN ABA200T D3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D3.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D3.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE3 LEFT JOIN ABA200T D4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D4.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D4.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE4 LEFT JOIN ABA200T D5 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D5.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D5.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE5 LEFT JOIN ABA200T D6 WITH (NOLOCK) ON D6.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D6.AC_CD = A.AC_CODE6 WHERE A.KEY_VALUE = #{KEY_VALUE}
ORDER BY A.EX_DATE, A.EX_NUM, A.EX_SEQ
SELECT ACCNT FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ACCNT_SPEC = N'A' AND SLIP_SW = N'Y' AND GROUP_YN = N'N' AND COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE}
mapper.update: {call USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip60 ( #{S_COMP_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 법인코드 , #{FR_PUB_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 계산서일 FROM , #{TO_PUB_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 계산서일 TO , #{DIV_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 사업장 , #{FR_CUSTOM_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 거래처 FROM , #{TO_CUSTOM_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 거래처 TO , #{BL_SER_NO, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 선적관리번호 , #{BILL_TYPE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 부가세유형 , #{DATE_OPTION, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 전표일 생성옵션 , #{WORK_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 실행일 , #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 로그인사용자ID , #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 시스템일자 , #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) KEY 문자열 , #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 언어구분 , #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 호출경로(Batch, List, Each) , #{EBYN_MESSAGE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) TRUE:메세지띄움, FALSE:메세지안띄움 , #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 에러명세 , #{SLIP_KEY_VALUE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 개별자동기표일 경우 로그테이블의 KEY 문자열 )}

{call USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip60Cancel ( #{S_COMP_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 법인코드 , #{FR_PUB_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 계산서일 FROM , #{TO_PUB_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 계산서일 TO , #{DIV_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 사업장 , #{FR_CUSTOM_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 거래처 FROM , #{TO_CUSTOM_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 거래처 TO , #{BL_SER_NO, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 선적관리번호 , #{BILL_TYPE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 부가세유형 , #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 부가세유형 , #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 로그인사용자ID , #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) KEY 문자열 , #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 언어구분 , #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 호출경로(Batch, List, Each) , #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 에러명세
)}

{call USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip63 ( #{S_COMP_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 법인코드 , #{FR_ORDER_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 발생일 FROM , #{TO_ORDER_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 발생일 TO , #{DIV_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 사업장 , #{TRADE_DIVI, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 무역구분 , #{CHARGE_TYPE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 경비구분 , #{CHARGE_SER, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=java.lang.Integer} -- (선택) 경비순번 , #{CHARGE_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 경비코드 , #{CUSTOM_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 지급처코드 , #{DATE_OPTION, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 전표일 생성옵션 , #{WORK_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 실행일 , #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 로그인사용자ID , #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 시스템일자 , #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) KEY 문자열 , #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 언어구분 , #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 호출경로(Batch, List, Each) , #{EBYN_MESSAGE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) TRUE:메세지띄움, FALSE:메세지안띄움 , #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 에러명세 , #{SLIP_KEY_VALUE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 개별자동기표일 경우 로그테이블의 KEY 문자열 )}

{call USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip64Cancel ( #{S_COMP_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 법인코드 , #{DIV_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 사업장 , #{BL_SER_NO, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 선적관리번호 , #{DATE_OPTION, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 전표일 생성옵션 , #{WORK_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 실행일 , #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) 부가세유형 , #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 로그인사용자ID , #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (선택) KEY 문자열 , #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 언어구분 , #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 호출경로(Batch, List, Each) , #{EBYN_MESSAGE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) TRUE:메세지띄움, FALSE:메세지안띄움 , #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 에러명세 , #{SLIP_KEY_VALUE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 개별자동기표일 경우 로그테이블의 KEY 문자열
)}

{call uniLITE.USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip66 ( #{S_COMP_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{DATE_OPTION, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{PROC_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{EBYN_MESSAGE, mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{SLIP_KEY_VALUE, mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} )}

DECLARE @JSON_PARAM NVARCHAR(2000), @ERROR_DESC NVARCHAR(2000)
--※ 주의 : Json 파람조건에 엔터키 값 없이 해야함. SET @JSON_PARAM = '{"COMP_CODE":"${S_COMP_CODE}","AC_YYYYMM":"${AC_YYYYMM}","FR_AC_DATE":"${FR_AC_DATE}","TO_AC_DATE":"${TO_AC_DATE}","DIV_CODE":"${DIV_CODEQ}","PJT_CODE":"${PJT_CODE}","EX_DATE":"${EX_DATE}","USER_ID":"${S_USER_ID}","INPUT_DATE":"${INPUT_DATE}","LANG_TYPE":"${S_LANG_CODE}"}' exec uniLITE.USP_ACCNT_AutoSlip67 @JSON_PARAM, @ERROR_DESC OUTPUT
SELECT ISNULL(@ERROR_DESC, '') AS ERROR_DESC

, #{S_USER_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 입력-로그인사용자ID , #{INPUT_DATE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 입력-시스템일자 , #{KEY_VALUE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} , #{S_LANG_CODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 언어구분 , #{CALL_PATH, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (필수) 호출경로(Batch, List, Each) , #{EBYN_MESSAGE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} , #{ERROR_DESC, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 에러명세 , #{SLIP_KEY_VALUE, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} -- (반환) 개별자동기표일 경우 로그테이블의 KEY 문자열 )}
